Today's call (July 28) is on in about 2.5 hours =). Links of interest include: a Zoom Meeting and Confluence Agenda/Notes.

Cheers!

Hi all! The call for today (September 8) will start in about three hours (1:00 PM central time). For convenience, here are today's hyperlinky goodness: Zoom, Confluence Agenda/Notes, and the sign-in page.

Cheers!
Just as a reminder, there is no call this week (September 22) due to the WGM. Thanks!

Happy Wednesday! Friendly reminder that today's call is on in a few hours (1:00 PM Central US). As always, links (and attendance) are free!

  • The meeting is on Zoom
  • The notes are on Confluence
  • The sign in page is a Google Sheet
    Cheers!

Hi all, given that the current agenda consists of editorial work I was planning on cancelling the call series for now. I'll post a link asking for feedback when I complete the next pass, but is there anything else people would like to see covered before we wind down?
@Gino Canessa Are we having a subscriptions call today or did the Argo/FHIR-I Subscriptions Calendar series not get fully deleted from the Argo Calendar?

Ack! Series is done unless someone has something else to bring up. Thought I had removed everything.

Iâ€™ll try to remove it again shortly.
There we go, @Jason Vogt , should be fixed. Thanks again!
